block-att.description: Cancel attacks for next turn (all animal attacks)
block-att.name: Block all attacks for 1 turn

draw-2.description: Draw 2 cards from the main deck
draw-2.name: Draw 2 cards from main deck

2-anim-gy.description: Return 2 animals to deck from graveyard
2-anim-gy.name: Return 2 dead animals to deck

block-pow.description: Block opponent from using power cards
block-pow.name: Block power cards for 1 turn

place-king.name: Place an active king on board

rev-last-pow.description: Activate last power card used (activate directly)
rev-last-pow.name: Activate last power card used

rev-any-anim-1hp.description: Sacrifice 1 hp to revive any animal, can attack
rev-any-anim-1hp.name: Revive any animal for 1hp

steal-anim-3hp.description: Sacrifice 3 hp to switch side of an opponent animal
steal-anim-3hp.name: Steal animal opponent for 3hp

double-tank-ap.description: Double attack points of a Tank
double-tank-ap.name: Double AP of a Tank
